ya5.2.2:32.1: arahantānaṃ yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti → paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
ya5.2.2:149.1: uppādakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne → nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
ya5.2.2:152.1: bhaṅgakkhaṇe → bhaṅgakkhaṇe asaññasattaṃ upapajjantānaṃ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1, csp1ed)
ya5.2.2:156.1: asaññasattaṃ upapajjantānaṃ arūpe aggamaggassa ca phalassa ca bhaṅgakkhaṇe → arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca bhaṅgakkhaṇe asaññasattaṃ upapajjantānaṃ (cck), arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca bhaṅgakkhaṇe apāyaṃ asaññasattaṃ upapajjantānaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed), arūpe maggamaggassa ca phalassa ca bhaṅgakkhaṇe, asaññasattaṃ upapajjantānaṃ (csp1ed)
